title: Stroom for iOS Is a Social News Platform for Sharing Breaking News With the World
text:
Stroom Inc.
Stroom is a news-focused social platform that puts news reporting and discovery into the hands of the people, allowing them to share unfiltered and unbiased breaking news with the rest of the world through live streaming and pre-captured media. Stroom is a platform designed to be used by both citizen journalists and professionals.
VANCOUVER, Canada , Oct. 9, Today, Stroom Inc. released its first version of the Stroom app for iOS. Stroom is a news-focused social platform that puts news reporting and discovery into the hands of the people, allowing them to share unfiltered and unbiased breaking news with the rest of the world through live streaming and pre-captured media. Stroom is a platform designed to be used by both citizen journalists and professionals.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151008/275486
Stroom is the only platform of its kind that is designed specifically for news, while supporting live streaming video from a mobile device. Its unique ranking system makes it easy to find the top local and global news. All media is permanent, allowing users go back and browse through old news so that they can experience important events from the past.
Stroom Features
Discover the most popular news stories locally and from around the world. Live stream breaking news from your mobile device. Upload previously captured videos and images of news events. Easily share the news with your network through Facebook and Twitter. All news media is stored perpetually, and does not expire. Pricing and Availability
Stroom is available on the App Store for free. Stroom is designed for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. Stroom requires OS 7.0 or newer. Available as of October 9 , 2015.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/stroom-for-ios-is-a-social-news-platform-for-sharing-breaking-news-with-the-world-300157050.html
